name: Akhanda Seva for International Shanti
briefDescription: Operation Shanti believes: Everyone should have the opportunity to live to their potential.Every day we provide essential human services--food, shelter, educational and medical assistance--because only after their basic needs are met can the destitute begin to help themselves.Our Work: We focus our efforts in three projects areas: Home, Street, and Food. Today we are working in Mysore, India.
